text: Share Tweet Email Copy Link Copied It ’ s the time of year for people to exchange shiny trinkets and baubles with one another, and just in time, The Orville has a line of merchandise inspired by the show for those last - minute gift givers or super - fans looking to treat themselves. Season 2 of the Star Trek - inspired sci - fi sorta - comedy from Seth MacFarlane is headed to FOX just before 2018 calls it a day, and the folks from NECA, Rizolli, Ripple Junction, Titan, Kidrobot, Dark Horse, Rittenhouse ( not the evil organization from NBC ’ s Timeless ) and Think Geek are ready with a ton of merchandise to help mark the occasion.
